extracted_playbook.title: Update to myPRO Manager v1.4
extracted_playbook.description: Update the system to myPRO Manager version 1.4 to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure control system devices and systems are not accessible from the internet by minimizing network exposure.

extracted_playbook.title: Isolate Control System Networks
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use secure methods such as VPNs, ensuring they are updated to the most current version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies for ICS
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets, as detailed on the ICS webpage at cisa.gov/ics.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.

extracted_playbook.title: Avoid Clicking Unsolicited Links or Attachments
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited email messages to protect against social engineering attacks.

extracted_playbook.title: Educate on Social Engineering and Phishing
extracted_playbook.description: Refer to resources on recognizing and avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks for more information.
